newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK BROKERS INITIATE CORPORATE BRIEFING.
newsitem.headline: GREEK BROKERS INITIATE CORPORATE BRIEFING.

text.p: Athens bourse-listed companies will regularly brief Greek equity analysts and brokers over their fundamentals and business plans, the Greek brokers' association (SMEHA) said in a statement.
SMEHA launches a scheme of regular corporate briefings following the warm welcome by Greek institutional investors of private briefings by Greek listed companies.
Greek institutionals have already been briefed in private by a total of 42 Greek listed companies since December 1996 in meetings held at the Association of Greek Institutional Investors.
The schedule of SMEHA's corporate briefings for the coming days is as follows:
